description: This migration runs all the necessary database changes mentioned in step 3, of Migrate from Vendr to Umbraco Commerce. It runs the migration before Umbraco Commerce gets installed, so it should get all your data in the right place.

description: Tired of waiting for the automatic daily indexing, before your package shows up on the marketplace? Use this bookmarklet.

title: Using MJML for HTML emails with Umbraco Forms
description: HTML emails are notoriously difficult to style due to inconsistent rendering across email clients. Fortunately, MJML provides a modern solution that simplifies email creation while ensuring compatibility.

description: Help your users find what they are looking for, when they hit a 404 Page Not Found

description: Tired of Umbraco Cloud performing a deploy to nowhere, when you push branches other than main?

title: Creating Duplicate Content in Umbraco without Duplicating Content
description: This article shows how to reuse a single piece of content in multiple places in Umbraco without duplicating it, using internal routing and canonical links to stay SEO-friendly.

title: Simple redirect engine from the Umbraco content tree
description: This article demonstrates how to build a simple redirect page in Umbraco using the content tree, allowing editors to manage redirects as part of site navigation.
